draw.ui.tools

Class SelTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • draw.ui.tools.Tool
        • draw.ui.tools.SelTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action

    public class SelTool
extends Tool
    Tool implementation for handling selections. Either the tool selects objects, moves selected objects, or resizes a selected objet.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Enumeration for encoding the different selection states of this tool

    • Method Detail

      • paintToolFeedBack

        public void paintToolFeedBack(Graphics g)
        Paints the feedback for the current gesture. Called by DrawPanel.paintComponent(Graphics). Feedback is dependent of the state of this tool.
        Overrides:
        paintToolFeedBack in class Tool
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent me)
        Handles mouse clicked events (forwarded from drawing panel) by finding a selected shape and making it the single selected shape or, is shift down is pressed, changes the selection of this shape (add when not selected, remove when is selected).
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseClicked in class Tool
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event object

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent me)
        Handles mouse pressed events (forwarded from drawing panel). Finds out the selected element. Initiates a resizing, moving or selection process dependent on the selection.
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class Tool
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event object

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent me)
        Handles mouse dragged events (forwarded from drawing panel). Dependent of the state of this tool will either show resizing, moving, or selecting shapes. Does not actually execute the operation but will show a visual feedback.
        Specified by:
        mouseDragged in interface MouseMotionListener
        Overrides:
        mouseDragged in class Tool
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event object

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent me)
        Handles mouse released events (forwarded from drawing panel). Dependent of the state of this tool will either resize a selected shape, moving selected shape, or change the selections of shapes.
        Specified by:
        mouseReleased in interface MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseReleased in class Tool
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event object

      • changeSelection

        private void changeSelection(Shape s)
        Changes the selection state of a shape. That means, when not selecte will select the shape, when selected will deselect the shape.
        Parameters:
        s - the shape to change the selections state.

      • isMoveSelection

        private boolean isMoveSelection(MouseEvent me)
        Tests if the event should result in move of shapes.
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event
        Returns:
        true if this event should result in a move of shapes

      • isResizeSelection

        private boolean isResizeSelection(MouseEvent me)
        Tests if the event should result in resize of a single selected shape.
        Parameters:
        me - the mouse event
        Returns:
        true if this event should result in a resize of a shape
